title: Astroburn 1.0.91.0 Free Version
description:
Copied from Astroburn Homepage:


Astroburn is a simple tool for burning and mastering CD, DVD, Blu-Ray and HD-DVD media. Astroburn supports all types of optical storage media (including CD-R/RW, DVD-R/RW, DVD+R/RW, BD-R/RE, HD-DVD-R/RW and DVD-RAM) as well as a wide variety of burning hardware. With Astroburn you can perform burning and mastering operations. Astroburn enables you to create CDs / DVDs with just a few mouse clicks.
Astroburn is easy to learn and to use.

Astroburn is the perfect match for DAEMON Tools Lite!
You could start Astroburn directly from DAEMON Tools Lite interface
(Mount'n'Drive Manager) and burn images you are using with DT Lite.


Key features:


* Burn your image files with Astroburn.

* Compose audio projects using additional feature for listening to the music before start burning.

* Master your own data projects by setting or lifting restrictions for filenames and filesizes.
It's simple! All you need is just to select the apropriate filesystem.

* Make perfect disc copies. Firstly Astroburn will create a proper image file and then burn it to any storage media you want.
To keep the image or not - you decide!

* Find out the best read speed for your physical drive with Astroburn and create proper image files by choosing your disc type.

* Quckly or fully erase rewritable discs. If the maximum erase speed is not good for your drive - no problem! You could slow it down for safer disc erasing.


Key benefits:


* Small size

* Quick on start

* Easy-to-use



Release Notes:

Bugs fixed:


* Large files burning in UDF;

* Unicode UDF file system supporting;

* Creation of boot image for iso9660;

* Minor GUI bugs.
